data.title: Cranberry alumni make robotics a reality for local students
data.description: From Disney animator to Boston Dynamics Principal Designer, Leland Hepler inspires Cranberry students with robotics career insights.
data.author: JAMIE HUNT Staff writer
data.keywords: centerpiece, cranberry area school district, boston dynamics, leland hepler, robotics careers, spot robot, cranberry alumni, high school technology, steam education, robotics presentation, pa school news, local parents cranberry, cgi animation to robotics
